frames.caption: A colossal, fiery gorilla-like creature strides across a savannah landscape, its body engulfed in flames. A young boy stands in awe, gazing up at the towering figure as the sun sets behind them, casting a warm glow over the scene.
frames.description: The scene depicts a fantastical encounter between a giant, flaming creature and a child in a savannah setting. The sky is filled with dramatic clouds, and the landscape features sparse trees typical of a savannah.

frames.caption: A colossal gorilla engulfed in flames strides across a savannah landscape, its eyes glowing intensely. A young boy stands in the foreground, gazing up at the towering creature with a mix of awe and trepidation. The sky is painted with dramatic clouds, adding to the epic atmosphere of the scene.
frames.description: The scene depicts a fantastical encounter between a giant, fiery gorilla and a young boy in a savannah setting. The dramatic lighting and fiery elements create a sense of tension and wonder.

summary: People: boy. Animals: gorilla. Nature: savannah, clouds, trees. Objects: fire. Actions: walking, gazing. Emotions: awe, trepidation. Scenes: fantasy, sunset, epic. Concepts: encounter, giant, fire, contrast
